Investor Information

Shares of Lonza Group Ltd are listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange and were included in the Swiss Market Index (SMI) in 2017. Lonza also maintains a secondary listing on the SGX Singapore Exchange. The nominal value of the Lonza Group Ltd share is CHF 1. Lonza's share price closed at the end of 2017 at CHF 2633, which represents an increase of 49.4% in 2017.

The free ﬂoat in Lonza Group Ltd registered shares reached 99.7% at year—end, and the average daily trade volume was 314,971 shares in 2017.
